channel.title: (317) Need help with a few things
channel.description:
I want to know how to make a level requirement to enter a portal. For example, to enter the portal you would need a combat level of 100. How do I do that?
I also want to know how to make yourself teleport after you kill someone in a certain area, and how to make a portal automatically teleblock you when you enter it.
